ygData.subject: Re: Smithing and "spoilers"
ygData.msgSnippet: Ore may be found in Highhold Keep. NOT HIGHHOLD PASS! Look for the miner guy around the corner from the bank. ... From: John Robertson  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Ore may be found in Highhold Keep. NOT HIGHHOLD PASS! Look for the miner guy
around the corner from the bank.

-----Original Message-----
From: John Robertson <johnr@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, May 07, 1999 1:21 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Smithing and "spoilers"


>From: "John Robertson" <johnr@...>
>
>
>
>David Rubino wrote:
>
>> From: David Rubino <tigger@...>
>>
>> PLEASE do not fall into this trap. I personally do not care about
so-called
>> "spoilers". I would not be reading this list if I did not want info about
>> the game. The game absurdly poorly documented, making things like this
list
>> a god send. Here I can learn things that otherwise would take me
pointless
>> hours of frustration that could be spent actually having fun in the game.
>
>Just so you all know, the only reason I asked for it to be emailed
privately
>was that since this is a bard list, I assumed people wouldn't want a lot of
>off-topic smith stuff here, that's all.
>
>If you read my posts, you know I'm not anti-spoiler (though I think it
should
>be labelled as such).
>
>Jyzan
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Did you know that
>http://www.ONElist.com
>More than 3.5 million people are using ONElist?
